languages.text: {n}Клеменциа выглядит истощенной: под глазами залегли глубокие тени, а руки немного дрожат. Она смотрит на вас со смесью изумления и горечи.{/n} "Ваша Светлость... неужели это вы? Мы уже {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}утратили надежду{/d} увидеть вас вновь!"

{n}Clementia looks haggard, with deep shadows under her eyes and her hands trembling slightly. She is staring at you with a mixture of amazement and bitterness.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... is it really you? We'd {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}lost all hope{/d} of seeing you again!"
languages.original_text: {n}Клеменциа выглядит истощенной: под глазами залегли глубокие тени, а руки немного дрожат. Она смотрит на вас со смесью изумления и горечи.{/n} "Ваша Светлость... неужели это вы? Мы уже {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}утратили надежду{/d} увидеть вас вновь!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Clementia looks haggard — with deep shadows under her eyes and her hands trembling slightly. She is staring at you with a mixture of amazement and bitterness.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... is it really you? We've lost all hope of seeing you again!"

{n}Clementia looks haggard — with deep shadows under her eyes and her hands trembling slightly. She is staring at you with a mixture of amazement and bitterness.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... is it really you? We've lost all hope of seeing you again!"

{n}Clementia looks haggard, with deep shadows under her eyes and her hands trembling slightly. She is staring at you with a mixture of amazement and bitterness.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... is it really you? We'd lost all hope of seeing you again!"

{n}Clementia looks haggard, with deep shadows under her eyes and her hands trembling slightly. She is staring at you with a mixture of amazement and bitterness.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... is it really you? We'd lost all hope of seeing you again!"

{n}Clementia looks haggard, with deep shadows under her eyes and her hands trembling slightly. She is staring at you with a mixture of amazement and bitterness.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... is it really you? We'd lost all hope of seeing you again!"

languages.text: {n}クレメンティアの目の下には深い隈があり、手はわずかに震えていることから、すっかり憔悴しきっているように見える。驚きと苦渋の混じった表情でこちらを見つめていた。{/n}「陛下…本当に陛下のですか？もう二度と会えないものだと{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}覚悟{/d}しておりました！」
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia looks haggard, with deep shadows under her eyes and her hands trembling slightly. She is staring at you with a mixture of amazement and bitterness.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... is it really you? We'd {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}lost all hope{/d} of seeing you again!"

traits.locale_text: {n}クレメンティアの目の下には深い隈があり、手はわずかに震えていることから、すっかり憔悴しきっているように見える。驚きと苦渋の混じった表情でこちらを見つめていた。{/n}「陛下…本当に陛下のですか？もう二度と会えないものだと{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}覚悟{/d}しておりました！」

languages.text: {n}克莱门缇雅面露憔悴，眼底乌青，双手微微颤抖。她死死地盯着你，目光中带着惊喜与悲怆。{/n}“大人……真的是您吗？我们还以为{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}再也见不到{/d}您了！”
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia looks haggard, with deep shadows under her eyes and her hands trembling slightly. She is staring at you with a mixture of amazement and bitterness.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... is it really you? We'd {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}lost all hope{/d} of seeing you again!"

traits.locale_text: {n}克莱门缇雅面露憔悴，眼底乌青，双手微微颤抖。她死死地盯着你，目光中带着惊喜与悲怆。{/n}“大人……真的是您吗？我们还以为再也见不到您了！”

languages.text: {n}Clementia parece demacrada, con ojos oscurecidos y manos temblorosas. Te mira con una mezcla de asombro y amargura.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}... ¿de verdad es usted? ¡Habíamos {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}perdido toda esperanza{/d} de volver a verl{mf|e|a}!».
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia looks haggard, with deep shadows under her eyes and her hands trembling slightly. She is staring at you with a mixture of amazement and bitterness.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... is it really you? We'd {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}lost all hope{/d} of seeing you again!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Clementia parece demacrada, con ojos oscurecidos y manos temblorosas. Te mira con una mezcla de asombro y amargura.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}... ¿de verdad es usted? ¡Habíamos perdido toda esperanza de volver a verl{mf|e|a}!».

languages.text: {n}Les mains de Clémentia tremblent légèrement et son regard las est souligné par de profonds cernes. Elle vous dévisage, affichant un mélange de stupéfaction et d'amertume.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie... C'est bien vous ? Nous avions {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}perdu tout espoir{/d} de vous revoir ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia looks haggard, with deep shadows under her eyes and her hands trembling slightly. She is staring at you with a mixture of amazement and bitterness.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... is it really you? We'd {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}lost all hope{/d} of seeing you again!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Les mains de Clémentia tremblent légèrement et son regard las est souligné par de profonds cernes. Elle vous dévisage, affichant un mélange de stupéfaction et d'amertume.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie... C'est bien vous ? Nous avions perdu tout espoir de vous revoir ! »

languages.text: {n}Clementia wirkt ausgemergelt, mit dunklen Schatten unter ihren Augen, und ihre Hände zittern leicht. Sie sieht dich mit einer Mischung aus Erstaunen und Verbitterung an.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... seid Ihr es wirklich? Wir hatten schon {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}jede Hoffnung verloren{/d}, Euch wiederzusehen!"
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia looks haggard, with deep shadows under her eyes and her hands trembling slightly. She is staring at you with a mixture of amazement and bitterness.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... is it really you? We'd {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}lost all hope{/d} of seeing you again!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Clementia wirkt ausgemergelt, mit dunklen Schatten unter ihren Augen, und ihre Hände zittern leicht. Sie sieht dich mit einer Mischung aus Erstaunen und Verbitterung an.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... seid Ihr es wirklich?" Wir hatten schon jede Hoffnung verloren, Euch wiederzusehen!"

languages.text: {n}Elleri hafif titreyen Clementia'nın gözleri çökmüş, iyice bitkin görünüyor. Hayranlık ve acı duygularını bir arada yansıtan gözleriyle sana bakıyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri... Gördüğüm sahiden siz misiniz? Sizi tekrar görme {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}umudumuzu yitirmiştik{/d}!"
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia looks haggard, with deep shadows under her eyes and her hands trembling slightly. She is staring at you with a mixture of amazement and bitterness.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... is it really you? We'd {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}lost all hope{/d} of seeing you again!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Elleri hafif titreyen Clementia'nın gözleri çökmüş, iyice bitkin görünüyor. Hayranlık ve acı duygularını bir arada yansıtan gözleriyle sana bakıyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri... Gördüğüm sahiden siz misiniz? Sizi tekrar görme umudumuzu yitirmiştik!"
